name: HTTP Fetch, Linux Command Shell, Bind TCP Random Port Inline
author: Brendan Watters
Spencer McIntyre
Geyslan G. Bem <geyslan@gmail.com>
Aleh Boitsau <infosecurity@ya.ru>
description:
Fetch and execute a x86 payload from an HTTP server.

        Listen for a connection in a random port and spawn a command shell.
        Use nmap to discover the open port: 'nmap -sS target -p-'.
